author: potuz
content:
Call tomorrow: <t:1740751200:R> , please be there cause **this will be the last call before a CL spec update** Starting next week, with the very generous help from <@592004585506340885>, we will be updating the CL spec. By the end of the effort we want to have at the very least static spec test vectors. We need to make some decisions like on PTC accounting and the such, some of the items in the list above are not so contentious, others are. Please take a look at the list that <@363800010518822915> wrote up and decide if you feel strongly about any of them. 

Agenda https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1321
Zoom link: https://ethereumfoundation.zoom.us/j/87569210985?pwd=3Cv1hDh7If4cq9IMXvNln1CtqQ72MR.1
